Module gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind
Package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema

Interface IConstraintBase

All Known Subinterfaces:
IConfigurableMessageConstraintBase, ITargetedConstraintBase
All Known Implementing Classes:
FlagAllowedValues, FlagExpect, FlagIndexHasKey, FlagMatches, TargetedAllowedValuesConstraint, TargetedExpectConstraint, TargetedHasCardinalityConstraint, TargetedIndexConstraint, TargetedIndexHasKeyConstraint, TargetedIsUniqueConstraint, TargetedMatchesConstraint
public interface IConstraintBase
Represents constraint metadata that is common to all constraints.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    MarkupLine
    getDescription()
    Get a description of what the constraint does.
    String
    getFormalName()
    Get the assigned formal name for the constraint.
    String
    getId()
    Get the assigned identifier for the constraint.
    String
    getLevel()
    Get the requested level to report if the constraint is not satisfied.
    List<Property>
    getProps()
    Get an optional collection of properties assigned to the constraint.
    Remarks
    getRemarks()
    Get the optional remarks that provide additional details explanation the intent or use of the constraint.

  • Method Details

    • getId

      @Nullable String getId()
      Get the assigned identifier for the constraint.

      This identifier is useful for to support references to the constraint.

      Returns:
      the identifier or null if no identifier is assigned

    • getFormalName

      @Nullable String getFormalName()
      Get the assigned formal name for the constraint.

      This name is useful for understanding the intent of the constraint.

      Returns:
      the formal name or null if no formal name is assigned

    • getDescription

      @Nullable MarkupLine getDescription()
      Get a description of what the constraint does.

      This description is useful for understanding the intent of the constraint.

      Returns:
      the description or null if no description is provided

    • getProps

      @Nullable List<Property> getProps()
      Get an optional collection of properties assigned to the constraint.

      A property provides a means to assign various characteristics to a constraint.

      Returns:
      the properties or null if no properties are provided

    • getRemarks

      @Nullable Remarks getRemarks()
      Get the optional remarks that provide additional details explanation the intent or use of the constraint.

      Use of remarks can provide additional insights into why a constraint exists or why the constraint was implemented in this way.

      Returns:
      the remarks or null if no remarks are provided

    • getLevel

      @Nullable String getLevel()
      Get the requested level to report if the constraint is not satisfied.

      If not provided, then the default level provided by IConstraint.DEFAULT_LEVEL is used.

      Returns:
      the level or null if the default level is to be used
